featured.text: Egyptians also built pyramids as 20 for their kings, or pharaohs.

definition.zh_def: 法老是古埃及的君主，通常被視為神的化身，擁有至高無上的權力。
definition.en_def: Pharaohs were the rulers of ancient Egypt, often regarded as gods in human form, possessing absolute power.
definition.example: The pharaohs built magnificent pyramids as tombs for themselves.
